meanings.definition: Relating to, consisting of, or resembling mucus.
meanings.sent1: The mucous substance helped protect the delicate tissues.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the runny nose was due to excess mucous production.
meanings.sent3: The mucous texture of the slime made it perfect for a prank.
meanings.sent4: The mucous film on the pond shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The mucous consistency of the glue made it difficult to remove.

meanings.sent1: The mucous surface of the leaf trapped tiny insects.
meanings.sent2: The mucous lining of the stomach helps protect it from acid.
meanings.sent3: The mucous layer on the cake made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The mucous film on the window obscured the view outside.
meanings.sent5: The mucous coating on the candy gave it a strange texture.
